mapper.select: SELECT o.orderId, o.orderDate, p.productName, s.purchaseQty, s.purchasePrice FROM orderStmt o JOIN purchaseOrder s ON s.orderId = o.orderId JOIN product p ON p.productId = s.productId WHERE o.orderId = #{orderId} AND o.storeId = #{storeId}

SELECT po.orderId, po.productId, po.purchasePrice, po.purchaseQty, p.productName, top.categoryId AS topCategoryId, sub.categoryId AS subCategoryId FROM purchaseOrder po JOIN orderStmt os ON os.orderId = po.orderId AND os.storeId = #{storeId} LEFT JOIN product p ON po.productId = p.productId LEFT JOIN productCategory sub ON p.categoryId = sub.categoryId LEFT JOIN productCategory top ON sub.parentId = top.categoryId WHERE po.orderId = #{orderId} ORDER BY po.productId
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO purchaseOrder (orderId, productId, purchasePrice, purchaseQty) VALUES (#{orderId}, #{productId}, #{purchasePrice}, #{purchaseQty})
